member.name: SPBEGINF
member.summary: Used by , these constants specify certain UI operations that are to be enabled or disabled.

member.name: SPBEGINF.SPBEGINF_AUTOTIME
member.summary: Indicates that the progress UI should automatically update a text field with the amount of time remaining until the action completes.

member.name: SPBEGINF.SPBEGINF_NOPROGRESSBAR
member.summary: Indicates that the UI should not display a progress bar.

member.name: SPBEGINF.SPBEGINF_MARQUEEPROGRESS
member.summary: Indicates that the UI should use a marquee-style progress bar.

member.name: SPBEGINF.SPBEGINF_NOCANCELBUTTON
member.summary: Indicates that the UI should not include a Cancel button.
